text: Novotroyevka () is a rural locality (a village) in Shemyaksky Selsoviet, Ufimsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 236 as of 2010. There are 2 streets. == Geography == It is located 57 km from Ufa, 7 km from Oktyabrsky. == References == Category:Rural localities in Ufimsky District
title: Novotroyevka, Ufimsky District, Republic of Bashkortostan
